events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team is reviewing your qualifications carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically targeting software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the interview process and address your queries.
The initial screening interview has been successfully completed, and we appreciate your detailed responses to our technical questions.
Thank you for promptly providing your availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled later this week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 3 PM UTC with our senior engineering panelists.
